text_block_list.text: A harsh, cold day on the Training Course in January-

There, lots of Classic grade Uma Musume spend their days training 
in prepartion for the Classic Cup starting in the spring.

If you want to challenge Classic Races, you only have a few 
chances in spring to get results! The fight has already begun!
text_block_list.name: Veteran Trainer A

text_block_list.text: Yes! Trainer!
text_block_list.name: Horsegirl A

text_block_list.text: Oh man, everyone's getting all fired up.
text_block_list.name: Gold Ship

text_block_list.text:
Classic races can only be challenged that one year you're in 
Classic grade, and if you don't, there's no second chances.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
Classic races can only be challenged that one year you're in 
Classic grade, and if you don't, there's no second chances.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text: Yes, that's why so many Uma Musume aspire to and aim for them.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text:
Buuuuut, we have someone here who took all 
those precious Classic Races for herself.
text_block_list.name: Gold Ship

text_block_list.text: …don't say it like I'm the bad guy here.
text_block_list.name: Narita Brian

text_block_list.text: Even you could grab hold of that glory, if you ran seriously.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text:
Hey! I'm always serious though! 
Obviously I plan on winning a Classic Race or two!
text_block_list.name: Gold Ship

text_block_list.text: (WHOOOOOOOOOOA!!!)

See, can't you hear that? The loud cheering from 
fans expecting big things from GolShi-chan!
text_block_list.name: Gold Ship

text_block_list.text:
What are they cheering for? 
There must be something exciting happening over there.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text: Are you ignoring me?!
text_block_list.name: Gold Ship

text_block_list.text: Haa… haa… fuu…
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text: She beat her best time again!
text_block_list.name: Reporter A

text_block_list.text:
I had heard there was a promising newcomer Debuting soon, and it 
definitely looks like she has plenty of potential!
text_block_list.name: Reporter B

text_block_list.text:
Keep it up, Suzuka. 
That speed you have is wonderful.
text_block_list.name: Suzuka's Trainer

text_block_list.text:
For now, let's gather experience for your Debut 
race, and polish that specialty of yours.
text_block_list.name: Suzuka's Trainer

text_block_list.text: Yes, understood.
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text: They're cheering for… Suzuka, it seems.
text_block_list.name: Narita Brian

text_block_list.text: You know her?
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text: You know her?
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
What, you don't know her? Remember how there was 
that one girl, rumored to have tons of potential, 
that was absent when we enrolled?
text_block_list.name: Gold Ship

text_block_list.text: Her Debut is finally coming up. I'm looking forward to the race.
text_block_list.name: Mejiro McQueen

text_block_list.text:
The second time I heard Silence Suzuka's name come up, was 
several weeks later at the Kyoto race course.

There are alot of media people here, huh? 
You're also here for Silence Suzuka's debut, aren't you?
text_block_list.name: Reporter A

text_block_list.text:
Of course! We have 4 cameramen waiting. What kind of run are you 
expecting that that new star will show us?
text_block_list.name: Reporter C

text_block_list.text: Sounds like today is Silence Suzuka's debut race.

Even in school there are rumors about her, I wonder 
what she's like? While thinking that-
You're <Siruis>'s trainer, right?
text_block_list.name: Air Groove

text_block_list.text:
I'm Air Groove. Student Council Vice President. 
You've probably at least heard the name, haven't you?
text_block_list.name: Air Groove

text_block_list.text:
Just like a normal school, Tracen Academy has a student council, 
who's role is to support the students on behalf of the school.

Speaking of which, Narita Brian is also a member 
of the student council. It's so unexpected that 
sometimes the team members tease her about it.

If I recall correctly, nobody from ＜Sirius＞ is participating today… 
Are you perhaps here to see Suzuka's race?
text_block_list.name: Air Groove

text_block_list.text:
Nah, we're just here by coincidence. 
How about you, are you here to see Silence Suzuka's race?
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
Nah, we're just here by coincidence. 
How about you, are you here to see Silence Suzuka's race?
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
Suzuka is an acquaintance of mine. 
On top of that, she has the attention of the student council.
text_block_list.name: Air Groove

text_block_list.text: The Student Council's attention…?
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
Yeah, it seems President Rudolph also 
has high expectations for her.
text_block_list.name: Air Groove

text_block_list.text:
Oh?…She's got Student Council President Symboli 
Rudolph's attention? I'm suddenly becoming more 
interested in Silence Suzuka's race now.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
Oh?…She's got Student Council President Symboli 
Rudolph's attention? I'm suddenly becoming more 
interested in Silence Suzuka's race now.
text_block_list.name: <username>

text_block_list.text:
And when I saw her running with my own eyes, 
my interest only began to increase further-
Silence Suzuka is still in the lead entering the final corner!
text_block_list.name: Commentator

text_block_list.text:
And she increases her lead even further! 
Silence Suzuka, accelerates even more in to the final straight!
text_block_list.name: Commentator

text_block_list.text: Only 200m remain! Silence Suzuka continues to extend her lead!
text_block_list.name: Commentator

text_block_list.text:
Silence Suzuka led from start to finish, and her sprint on the 
straight increased her lead even further.

So strong!! 5 lengths, 6 lengths!! 
How much more does she intend to extend her lead?!
text_block_list.name: Commentator

text_block_list.text:
Silence Suzuka, reaches the goal!! 
She's marked her debut with a victory!!
text_block_list.name: Commentator

text_block_list.text:
Of course I was surprised by her strength, 
but what left a bigger impression was-
All right! You did it Suzuka!
text_block_list.name: Air Groove

text_block_list.text:
Ah… ahem. 
How was it? Suzuka's run, that is.
text_block_list.name: Air Groove

text_block_list.text: Yeah…! Her run was awesome, but more than that-
text_block_list.name: <username>
choice_data_list: <size=37>She looked like she was having so much fun!</size>
<size=37>She looked like she was having so much fun!</size>

text_block_list.text: Yeah…! Her run was awesome, but more than that-
text_block_list.name: <username>
choice_data_list: <size=37>She looked like she was having so much fun!</size>
<size=37>She looked like she was having so much fun!</size>

text_block_list.text: Having fun…?
text_block_list.name: Air Groove

text_block_list.text:
I see. So ＜Sirius＞'s trainer… 
Can sense that kind of thing.
text_block_list.name: Air Groove

text_block_list.text: (WHOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOAAAAA!!!!!!)
Haa… haaa…
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka

text_block_list.text: …Fufuu.
text_block_list.name: Silence Suzuka
